summary: This appears to be a cover email transmitting a filed version of a detention submission document related to Jeffrey Epstein's case in the Southern District of New York. The email was sent on July 17, 2019, and references an attached PDF titled '2019-07-17JE_detention_submission.Final.pdf'.

locations.context: Location of the Southern District of New York courthouse, where the detention submission was filed.

keyFacts: A detention submission document related to Jeffrey Epstein was filed on July 17, 2019.
The filing was made in the Southern District of New York, located at One Saint Andrew's Plaza in New York, NY.
The attached PDF filename suggests the document concerns detention matters for 'JE' (Jeffrey Epstein).
